Articles.Content: 1016: After getting into orbit around Duna, it's now waiting for the coming-back-to-home module, which will be put on orbit around Duna, and main module, after landing will dock to it and go home.

Year 1017: The protests against Physic-glitches exploitation grow to a International level. Kerlin, Kawsaw, Koscow and Karis are the city's which have been placed under marshal law so far, but more are expected to join the list. There are reports of firefights in the suburbs of Kerlin.
Year 1019: After two years of protests, the KAPGA (Kerbal Anti-Physic-Glitches Associasion) Is formed to keep those protesters at least 5 km away from "The Sandbox 51".
1020: Some protester paints a huge graffitti "Kouston. glitches are the problem", on replica of first spaceship to orbin Mun.

Year 1020.2: KASA (NASA) makes a public statement, and asks the protesters if THEY can fix physics glitches, because they bet THEY don't. And ask why infinigliders have to do with mun-orbit.

Edited February 8, 2014 by AletzN1
Year 1030: As the world descends into chaos, Merlin Kerman puts himself in stasis (newly invented) until the year 2000.
Year 1040: The SEKI program detects strange signals from Eve, and reports of "eve invaders" landing on Kerbin are worldwide.

Year 1050: An All-out war begins between Eve and Kerbin.

Edited February 8, 2014 by Souper
Year 1051: Jeb goes to Eve and blows up the Evbal (kerbal-like beings from eve) HQ, thus ending the war. Lots of new technology is obtained.

Year 1052: The glitch protesters get hold of this new Evebal technology and use it in violent protests. The Glitch War, has begun. The protesters control Kerlin, Koscow, Kashington, Kokyo and Kawsaw. Karis is close to falling in to the protestors control.

Edited February 8, 2014 by victory143

Year 1070: The Glitch war ends with a mysterious company called "SQUAD,INC" coming into the picture.

Somehow, some way, the glitches stop, and protesters back down and hand over the evebal tech. Then, they are all executed.

Year 1071: A huge asteroid 15 kilometers in length hits Kerbin, wiping out all surface Kerbal civilization, and destroying the KSC (Kerbal Space Center). Only the Kerbals at the North Pole Colony and the Mun Colony survive. Impact debris hit the Fractured Space Station and The International Kerbal Station, knocking the m out of orbit and causing them to crash into the Mun. The crater from this impact can still be seen today:

Kerbin Crater
Year 2000: The kerbals rebuild their home planet into what it once was. Also, Merlin Kerman is released from stasis.

Year 2000,2: Merlin Kerman is made the supreme kommander of the kerbal awesomeness (Kerbin King).

Edited February 9, 2014 by AletzN1
"Merlin KerBAL"
Year 2001: Merlin Kerman is assassinated and a revolutionary group called 'Nationalist Democratic government' seizes power.
2002: Another war begins- this one is big, really big, and is called First Kerbin War. There are two sides- Merlinians aka Democrats, and Nationalists aka Dictatorians/Communists.

Year 2003: There is a major conflict at the Thin Islands just above Western Kurope. The ground is rich with Keridium and Kerlum Ores which are needed by both sides to make sure they have enough materials to keep the war going. The Nationalists hold one third of the islands while the Democrats hold the other two thirds of the island. Who will win?

200%: After two years of war on Thin Islands (Nationalists have better waponry, but there are more Democrats), something very bad (to Democrats) happens. The biggest naval desant! Nationalists now have twice as much army as Democrats. Nationalists win (goo communism! (no just joking)). TThey now own the entire islands, and use materials on it to create more nuclear bombs.
2005: a video game called NASA comes out.

Year 2007: The democrats fall back to Kalingrad in Kussia. They mass forces in the city and fortify every house, on every street in every district. The Commander of the Democrats is the well-known General Koniu Lang. The supplies are stockpiled and they could keep fighting for years.
Year 2008: The democrats were able to sabotage the nacionalist resource mining at Thin islands. But in doing so they blocked 2 thirds of the massive mining shaft under the Thin islands.
Year 2009: The Democratic forces at Kalingrad begin a winter offensive and take vast swathes of Eastern Kurope and the Kiraq oil fields. The Oil is tapped immediately.
Year 2012: An ancient Kayan Kalender is realised, and a planet called Kerbiru swings by Kerbin, and changes it's rotation, which kills 345645 people.

Year 2014: The Democrats launch an all-out attack on Thin Islands, which results in the assasination of The Komunist forces's leader.

Democracy takes over kerbin.
Year 2025: Jeb, bill, and Bob come out of stasis.
